caption: This photograph depicts a polluted water surface with several items of litter floating or submerged in it. The water appears dark and murky, possibly indicating stagnation or pollution. Prominently visible in the scene is a smashed beverage can, distorted and partially submerged, reflecting light off its metallic surface. To the right, there is a discarded bottle cap, floating on the surface. The background and surrounding areas are filled with algae and plant debris, adding a sense of decay and neglect. Small sticks and detritus are scattered throughout, further emphasizing the polluted condition of the environment. Overall, the image portrays a somber scenario highlighting environmental pollution and the impact of human waste on natural water bodies.
title: Beer bottle and paper plate among the lily pads--unwelcome mementoes of a Fourth of July celebration at a county park along the Wisconsin River
